name: zepp-nightscout
description: An app for Zepp OS that connects to Nightscout instance and displays CGM data

scripts.install:device: echo 'Run: zeus install (requires @zeppos/zeus-cli and connected device)'
scripts.test:syntax: node --check page/index.js && node --check app-side/index.js && node --check shared/message.js
scripts.help:
echo 'Available commands:
  npm run dev - Start dev server
  npm run build - Build app
  npm run build:prod - Build for production
  npm run test - Run tests
  npm run test:syntax - Check JavaScript syntax
  npm run simulator - Start simulator
  npm run install:device - Install to device

For more info, see TESTING.md'
